name: Police Runner (ELLEP)
description:
Hi! This game is called "Police Runner" where you are a police officer running around in the city . I made a rage game to be specific.

You basically need to avoid obstacles by collecting stars and the same level loops again as the theme was " death is only the beginning" so I decided to make a Rogue-like endless runner with one level which loops itself untill the player dies , the goal of the player is to collect as many stars as possible , This game can be used to compete with friends and see how far you get or how more or less stars you and your friends collect . 

I had fun creating this game , it is not the best I can do OBVIOUSLY! But it was a great experience in programming and making game assets all by myself excluding the buildings as buildings were  stolen......I mean taken from kenny assets 

Here is the link to those assets :- https://kenney.nl/assets/city-kit-commercial 

and Here is the link to my source code :- https://github.com/Jai-Khatri/GameDev.tv-Game-Jam-PoliceRunner-Code

A huge thank you to GameDev.TV for hosting this game jam as it improved my game development skills overall .

Thank you for reading till the end!
